g.phishy_message: 鏈接擴展為純文本; 提防潛在的網絡釣魚嘗試
g.you_need_private_password_or_key_not_a_p: You need a private password or key (not a public key)

the_rules_of_APP_NAME.one: The first rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.second: The second rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: Do not lose your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.third: The third rule of %(APP_NAME)s is: We cannot recover your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fourth: The fourth rule: If you can remember the password, it's not secure.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.fifth: The fifth rule: Use only randomly-generated passwords.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.sixth: The sixth rule: Do not tell anyone your password.
the_rules_of_APP_NAME.seventh: The seventh rule: Always back up your password.

g.backup_password_by_storing_it: Back it up by storing in your password manager or a text file
g.enter_account_show_password: Enter a valid account name to show the password
g.understand_that_APP_NAME_cannot_recover_: I understand that %(APP_NAME)s cannot recover lost passwords
g.i_saved_password: I have securely saved my generated password
g.password_must_be_characters_or_more: Password must be %(amount)s characters or more
g.need_password_or_key: 你需要一個私人密碼或密鑰(而不是公鑰)
g.account_name_should_start_with_a_letter: 帳戶名稱應該以字母開頭
g.account_name_should_have_only_letters_di: 帳戶名稱應該只有字母、數字或破折號
g.cannot_increase_reward_of_post_within_th: 在收到獎勵前的最後一分鐘內不能增加獎勵
g.vote_currently_exists_user_must_be_indic: 已經投過此見證人，您是否想取消此見證人的投票
g.only_one_APP_NAME_account_allowed_per_ip: 每10分鐘一個IP地址只允許一個Steem賬號
g.thank_you_for_being_an_early_visitor_to_: 感謝您早期訪問 %(APP_NAME)s。我們將盡快回复您。
g.sorry_your_reddit_account_doesnt_have_en: 不好意思，你的Reddit級別不夠高，我們不能為您免費註冊賬號。請在等候名單上加上你的電子郵件地址
g.or_click_the_button_below_to_register_wi: 或者點擊下面的按鈕，用臉書註冊
g.please_email_questions_to: 請把你的問題發郵件給

next_7_strings_single_block.authors_get_paid_when_people_like_you_up: 當您和其他人投票給作者的帖子，作者會得到報酬
next_7_strings_single_block.if_you_enjoyed_what_you_read_earn_amount: 如果您喜歡在這裡讀到的東西，您可以立即創建賬戶，開始賺免費的STEEM代幣!

g.read_only_mode: 由於服務器維護，我們只在只讀模式下運行。很抱歉給您帶來不便。

post_key_warning.confirm: 您即將發布STEEM私鑰或主密碼。您可能會失去對關聯賬戶和所有資金的控制權。
post_key_warning.warning: 包括Steemit Inc. 員工在內的合法用戶不會要求您提供私鑰或主密碼。

navigation.intro_paragraph: Your voice is worth something. Join the community that pays you to post and curate high quality content.

category_selector_jsx.tag_your_story: Tag (up to 5 tags), the first tag is your main category.

market_jsx.price_warning_below: This price is well below the current market price of %(marketPrice)s, are you sure?

recoveraccountstep1_jsx.unable_to_recover_account_not_change_own: We are unable to recover this account, it has not changed ownership recently.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.password_not_used_in_last_days: This password was not used on this account in the last 30 days.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.request_already_submitted_contact_suppor: Your request has been already submitted and we are working on it. Please contact %(SUPPORT_EMAIL)s for the status of your request.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.recover_account_intro: From time to time, a Steemian's owner key may be compromised. Stolen Account Recovery gives the rightful account owner 30 days to recover their account from the moment the thief changed their owner key. Stolen Account Recovery can only be used on %(APP_URL)s if the account owner had previously listed '%(APP_NAME)s' as their account trustee and complied with %(APP_NAME)s's Terms of Service.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_facebook_or_reddit_media_to_v: Please login with Facebook or Reddit to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.login_with_social_media_to_verify_identi: Please login with %(provider)s to verify your identity
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.enter_email_toverify_identity: We need to verify your identity. Please enter your email address below to begin the verification.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.thanks_for_submitting_request_for_accoun: Thanks for submitting your request for Account Recovery using %(APP_NAME)s's blockchain-based multi factor authentication. We will respond to you as quickly as possible, however, please expect there may be some delay in response due to high volume of emails. Please be prepared to verify your identity.
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.cant_confirm_account_ownership: We can't confirm account ownership. Check your password
recoveraccountstep1_jsx.account_recovery_request_not_confirmed: Account recovery request is not confirmed yet, please get back later, thank you for your patience.

user_profile.user_hasnt_made_any_posts_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't made any posts yet!
user_profile.user_hasnt_started_bloggin_yet: Looks like %(name)s hasn't started blogging yet!
user_profile.user_hasnt_followed_anything_yet: Looks like %(name)s might not be following anyone yet! If %(name)s recently added new users to follow, their personalized feed will populate once new content is available.
user_profile.looks_like_you_havent_posted_anything_ye: Looks like you haven't posted anything yet.
user_profile.this_is_users_reputations_score_it_is_ba:
This is %(name)s's reputation score.

The reputation score is based on the history of votes received by the account, and is used to hide low quality content.

post_jsx.now_showing_comments_with_low_ratings: Now showing comments with low ratings
post_jsx.comments_were_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: Comments were hidden due to low ratings

voting_jsx.flagging_post_can_remove_rewards_the_fla: Flagging a post can remove rewards and make this material less visible. Some common reasons to flag
voting_jsx.we_will_reset_curation_rewards_for_this_: will reset your curation rewards for this post

witnesses_jsx.you_can_vote_for_maximum_of_witnesses: 您最多可以投票30位見證人
witnesses_jsx.if_you_want_to_vote_outside_of_top_enter: 如果您想為前50名以外的見證人投票，請輸入帳戶名稱進行投票
witnesses_jsx.set_witness_proxy: 您也可以選擇一個代理為你投票見證人。這將重置您當前的見證人選擇。
witnesses_jsx.witness_set: 您已經設置了一個投票代理。如果你想重新啟用手動投票，請清除您的代理。
witnesses_jsx.proxy_update_error: 您的投票代理沒有更新

userkeys_jsx.posting_key_is_required_it_should_be_dif: 發布密鑰用於發表文章以及投票。它應該不同於活動密鑰以及所有者密鑰。
userkeys_jsx.the_active_key_is_used_to_make_transfers: 活動密鑰用於在內部市場進行轉帳和下單。
userkeys_jsx.the_owner_key_is_required_to_change_othe: 所有者密鑰是帳戶的主密鑰，用來更改其它密鑰。
userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: 所有者密鑰的私鑰或密碼應盡可能保持離線。
userkeys_jsx.the_memo_key_is_used_to_create_and_read_: 備註鍵用於創建和讀取備註。

suggestpassword_jsx.APP_NAME_cannot_recover_passwords_keep_t: %(APP_NAME)s無法恢復密碼。將此頁面保存到安全的位置，例如防火保險箱。
suggestpassword_jsx.after_printing_write_down_your_user_name: 打印後，寫下你的用戶名

converttosteem_jsx.your_existing_DEBT_TOKEN_are_liquid_and_: 您現有的%(DEBT_TOKEN)s是可轉移的。相反您可能希望直接在%(link)s的站點交易%(DEBT_TOKEN)s或轉移到外部市場。
converttosteem_jsx.this_is_a_price_feed_conversion: 這是一個系統幣價的轉換。為了防止濫用系統幣價，你的轉換需要等3.5天
converttosteem_jsx.DEBT_TOKEN_will_be_unavailable: 這一動作將在3.5天內完成，不能取消。這些%(DEBT_TOKEN)s將立即變得不可用

tips_js.liquid_token: 可交易的令牌可以在任何時候傳輸到任何地方。 %(LIQUID_TOKEN)s)可以被轉換成%(VESTING_TOKEN)s在一個被稱為增加能量的過程中。
tips_js.influence_token: 幣的影響力，可以讓您對文章的賞金有更大的控制權，讓您獲得審查獎勵。
tips_js.estimated_value: 估算值是%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s換算成美金的價值。
tips_js.non_transferable: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s是不可轉讓的，需要3個月(13週)才能轉換回%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s
tips_js.converted_VESTING_TOKEN_can_be_sent_to_y: %(VESTING_TOKEN)s可以轉給您自己或其他人，但是要再轉一次，就需要轉換回%(LIQUID_TOKEN)s。
tips_js.part_of_your_steem_power_is_currently_de: Part of %(user_name)s's STEEM POWER is currently delegated. Delegation is donated for influence or to help new users perform actions on steemit. Your delegation amount can fluctuate.

promote_post_jsx.spend_your_DEBT_TOKEN_to_advertise_this_: Spend your %(DEBT_TOKEN)s's to advertise this post in the promoted content section
promote_post_jsx.this_post_was_hidden_due_to_low_ratings: This post was hidden due to low ratings

about_jsx.about_app_details: %(APP_NAME)s is a social media platform where everyone gets paid for creating and curating content. It leverages a robust digital points system, called Steem, that supports real value for digital rewards through market price discovery and liquidity.
